state.description: Co-id reference to state machine definition

process.description: Co-id reference to process config (GenServer-style handlers)

brand.description: Co-id reference to brand style definition (uses style schema)

style.description: Co-id reference to local style definition

inbox.description: Co-id reference to message inbox costream (append-only message feed)

interface.description: REQUIRED: Message types this actor accepts (exhaustive list - like sealed protocol). All actors must declare their message contracts.

tool.description: Optional: Co-id reference to tool descriptor (LLM integration). Execution in .function.js
